Document.Focus: DASH diet to lower high blood pressure

QAPair.Question: What is (are) DASH diet to lower high blood pressure ?
QAPair.Answer: DASH stands for Dietary Approaches to Stop Hypertension and is recommended by the US National Heart, Lung and Blood Institute. The DASH diet can help lower high blood pressure, cholesterol and other fats in your blood. It can help lower your risk for heart attack and stroke and help you lose weight. This diet is low in sodium (salt) and rich in nutrients.
